column1: Little Goat Diner////This is one of my very favorite places to eat in Chicago. I'm a big fan of all things from Stephanie Izard including her restaurants
column2: events and following her on Top Chef. All the dishes her are winners in my mind from the pancakes to crumpets
column3: to the corn beef has (my favorite) with homemade bread and hot coffee. I've hd other meals here but since they serve breakfast all day here I try to take advantage.
